casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Rashawn Drean YARRELL. No. 448PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State. Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rashawnn D. Yarrell.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 30th day of August 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of November 2005."
